document.discussion_title: Indianapolis 500 Tickets @ Indianapolis Motor Speedway in Indianapolis, IN: Ticket Process Offers Last Minute Indianapolis 500 Tickets at Indianapolis Motor Speedway in Indiana, IN For May 29, 2016. | Innocent Information
document.topic_text: Indianapolis 500 Tickets @ Indianapolis Motor Speedway in Indianapolis, IN: Ticket Process Offers Last Minute Indianapolis 500 Tickets at Indianapolis Motor Speedway in Indiana, IN For May 29, 2016. May 10 Share it With Friends Indianapolis 500 will be at Indianapolis Motor Speedway in Indianapolis, Indiana on May 29, 2016. TicketProcess has an abundance of last minute Indy 500 tickets that are now on sale! Fans can purchase tickets online or call toll free to order by phone. The Indianapolis 500 will unfold at Indianapolis Motor Speedway on the afternoon of Sunday, May 29. TicketProcess.com encourages all IndyCar racing fans to begin their search for elite tickets at the esteemed and affordable online exchange. Defending champion Juan Pablo Montoya will be aiming to once again drink the delicious milk of victory, but a field of talented and hungry combatants will be aiming to dethrone one of the best in the business. Frenchman Simon Pagenaud is quite a bit ahead in the standings over second-place New Zealander Scott Dixon and Montoya, who currently sits in third. An array of different flags fill the top 20, including Brazilians Helio Castroneves and Tony Kanaan. It is early into the season, so plenty of stories are left to be told before the book is closed on the 2016 season. The annual 500 mile race is the most famous in all of the IndyCar circuit, and many racing fans around North America plan the pilgrimage to the historic venue every year. Other racing fans are hoping to experience the magic, power and history of the event for the very first time. Whatever the case may be, TicketProcess.com is ready and waiting with an array of cheap ticket options that will put fans in the middle of the loud and lightning-fast action on the final Sunday in May. About TicketProcess.com TicketProcess.com has been a secondary ticket exchange for both brokers and consumers for some time now. By offering a large selection of inventory to an array of the most exclusive sports, live concerts, theater events and other live entertainment, they have established their place as a reputable source of quality, guaranteed tickets for fans around the United States and beyond. Seven-days-a-week customer service combined with a 100% satisfaction guarantee has proved to be a simple yet effective strategy for the constantly growing online secondary ticket market. All fans of live entertainment are openly welcome to visit the easily accessible site and purchase their tickets with the confidence that comes with a proven track record. *TicketProcess.com is not associated or otherwise connected in any form with the college or professional organizations, teams, Indianapolis 500s, bands or other performers featured on this site. Additionally, TicketProcess.com has no affiliation with any of the venues listed on the site. Names and titles used in this press release are solely for descriptive purposes and do not imply, suggest or indicate that any type of endorsement or partnership is in place. Media Contact
